oracle.nosql.driver.idcs

Interface CredentialsProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PropertiesCredentialsProvider

    public interface CredentialsProvider
    CredentialsProvider returns 2 types of IDCSCredentials:
    1. Credentials encapsulating user name and password
    2. Credentials encapsulating client id and secret
    These credentials are used by an instance of AccessTokenProvider to acquire access tokens (ATs) for operations.

    For grant types such as resource owner grant, authorization code and assertion, which can generate a refresh token, this interface also supports methods that allow the implementation to store and read the refresh token.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IDCSCredentials getOAuthClientCredentials()
      Returns an IDCSCredentials instance encapsulating an OAuth Client id and secret.
      java.lang.String getServiceRefreshToken()
      Returns IDCS refresh token string
      IDCSCredentials getUserCredentials()
      Returns an IDCSCredentials instance encapsulating user name and password.
      void storeServiceRefreshToken(java.lang.String refreshToken)
      Allows storage of a refresh token string obtained from IDCS.

    • Method Detail

      • getOAuthClientCredentials

        IDCSCredentials getOAuthClientCredentials()
        Returns an IDCSCredentials instance encapsulating an OAuth Client id and secret.
        Returns:
        IDCS credentials or null if not available

      • getUserCredentials

        IDCSCredentials getUserCredentials()
        Returns an IDCSCredentials instance encapsulating user name and password. Note that the user password returned must be URL encoded.
        Returns:
        IDCS credentials or null if not available

      • getServiceRefreshToken

        java.lang.String getServiceRefreshToken()
        Returns IDCS refresh token string
        Returns:
        the refresh token stored by this provider, or null if not available

      • storeServiceRefreshToken

        void storeServiceRefreshToken(java.lang.String refreshToken)
        Allows storage of a refresh token string obtained from IDCS.
        Parameters:
        refreshToken - the refresh token string obtained from IDCS
